children.text: tadā na vyavahāro 'bhūn na dveṣo nāpi matsaraḥ || 1 ||
draṣṭā ca vyavahārāṇāṃ rājā daṇḍadharaḥ kṛtaḥ || 2 ||
likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś cātra dvau vidhī samprakīrtitau |
vivāde sottarapaṇe dvayor yas tatra hīyate |
sa paṇaṃ svakṛtaṃ dāpyo vinayaṃ ca parājaye || 5 ||
taddhānau hīyate vādī taraṃs tām uttaro bhavet || 6 ||
kulāni śreṇayaś caiva gaṇāś cādhikṛto nṛpaḥ |
sa catuṣpāc catuḥsthānaś catuḥsādhana eva ca |
triyonir dvyabhiyogaś ca dvidvāro dvigatis tathā || 9 ||
dharmaś ca vyavahāraś ca caritraṃ rājaśāsanam |
tatra satye sthito dharmo vyavahāras tu sākṣiṣu |
caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca rakṣaṇāt sa caturhitaḥ || 12 ||
kartṝn atho sākṣiṇaś ca sabhyān rājānam eva ca |
vyāpnoti pādaśo yasmāc caturvyāpī tataḥ smṛtaḥ || 13 ||
hiraṇyam agnir udakam aṣṭāṅgaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ || 15 ||
ṛṇādānaṃ hy upanidhiḥ sambhūya-utthānam eva ca |
eṣām eva prabhedo 'nyaḥ śatam aṣṭa.uttaraṃ smṛtam |
kāmāt krodhāc ca lobhāc ca tribhyo yasmāt pravartate |
triyoniḥ kīrtyate tena trayam etad vivādakṛt || 21 ||
tatra śiṣṭaṃ chalaṃ rājā marṣayed dharmasādhanaḥ |
bhūtam eva prapadyeta dharmamūlā yataḥ śriyaḥ || 25 ||
sambhavanti guṇāḥ sapta sapta vahner ivārciṣaḥ || 26 ||
dharmaś cārthaś ca kīrtiś ca lokapaktir upagrahaḥ |
prajābhyo bahumānaś ca svarge sthānaṃ ca śāśvatam || 27 ||

samaḥ syāt sarvabhūteṣu bibhrad vaivasvataṃ vratam || 28
                            ||
vivitsā nirṇayaś caiva darśanaṃ syāc caturvidham || 30 ||
yathā mṛgasya viddhasya vyādho mṛgapadaṃ nayet |
sūkṣmo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ parokṣo durvicāraṇaḥ |
yāty acauro 'pi cauratvaṃ cauraś cāyāty acauratām |
strīṣu rātrau bahir grāmād antarveśmany arātiṣu |
vyavahāraḥ kṛto 'py eṣu punaḥ kartavyatām iyāt || 37 ||
sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca sadya eva vivādayet || 39 ||
anāvedya tu yo rājñe sandigdhe 'rthe pravartate |
prasahya sa vineyaḥ syāt sa cāsyārtho na sidhyati || 40 ||
vaktavye 'rthe na tiṣṭhantam utkrāmantaṃ ca tadvacaḥ |
caturvidhaḥ syād āsedho nāsiddhas taṃ vilaṅghayet || 42 ||

sa vineyo 'nyathā kurvann āseddhā daṇḍabhāg bhavet || 44
                            ||
śilpinaḥ cāpi tatkālam āyudhīyāś ca vigrahe || 46 ||
viṣamasthaś ca nāsedhyo na ca-enān āhvayen nṛpaḥ || 47 ||
na cābhiyuktam anyena na viddhaṃ veddhum arhati || 48 ||
yam artham abhiyuñjīta na taṃ viprakṛtiṃ nayet |

nānyat pakṣāntaraṃ gacched gacchan pūrvāt sa hīyate || 49
                            ||
yas tatra vinayaḥ proktaḥ so 'bhiyoktāram āvrajet || 50 ||
sāpadeśaṃ haran kālam abruvaṃś cāpi saṃsadi |
uktvā vaco vibruvaṃś ca hīyamānasya lakṣaṇam || 51 ||
palāyate ya āhūtaḥ prāptaś ca vivaden na yaḥ |
vineyaḥ sa bhaved rājñā hīna eva sa vādataḥ || 52 ||
likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo vāpi pūrvam āveditaṃ na cet || 53 ||
yathā pakveṣu dhānyeṣu niṣphalāḥ prāvṛṣo guṇāḥ |
yat tu pramādān na-ucyeta tad bhūtam api hīyate || 55 ||
tīritaṃ cānuśiṣṭaṃ ca yo manyeta vidharmataḥ |
dviguṇaṃ daṇḍam āsthāya tat kāryaṃ punar uddharet || 56 ||
durdṛṣṭe vyavahāre tu sabhyās taṃ daṇḍam āpnuyuḥ |
na hi jātu vinā daṇḍaṃ kaścin mārge 'vatiṣṭhate || 57 ||
rāgād ajñānato vāpi lobhād vā yo 'nyathā vadet |

sabhyo 'sabhyaḥ sa vijñeyas taṃ rājā vinayed bhṛśam || 58
                            ||
puruṣāḥ santi ye lobhāt prabrūyuḥ sākṣyam anyathā |
ataḥ parīkṣyam ubhayam etad rājñā viśeṣataḥ |
dṛśyante vividhā bhāvās tasmād yuktaṃ parīkṣaṇam || 62 ||
talavad dṛśyate vyoma khadyoto havyavāḍ iva |
na talaṃ vidyate vyomni na khadyote hutāśanaḥ || 63 ||
parīkṣya jñāpayan arthān na dharmāt parihīyate || 64 ||
evaṃ paśyan sadā rājā vyavahārān samāhitaḥ |
śvo lekhanaṃ vā sa labhet tryahaṃ saptāham eva vā |
arthī tṛtīyapāde tu yuktaṃ sadyo dhruvaṃ jayī ||
mithyā sampratipattir vā pratyavaskandam eva vā |
mithyaitan nābhijānāmi tadā tatra na sannidhiḥ |
ajātaś cāsmi tatkāla evaṃ mithyā caturvidhā ||
mithyā ca viparītaṃ ca punaḥ śabdasamāgamam |
bhāṣāyā uttaraṃ yāvat pratyarthī na niveśayet |
arthī tu lekhayet tāvad yāvad vastu vivakṣitam ||
labdhavyaṃ yena yad yasmāt sa tat tasmād avāpnuyāt |

na tv anyo 'nyad athānyasmād ity anyārtham idaṃ tridhā || J
                            edn Mā 2.9 ||
hīnādhikā bhaved vyarthā tāṃ yatnena vivarjayet ||
bhraṣṭaṃ tu duḥsthitaṃ yat syāj jalatailādibhir hatam |
bhāṣāyāṃ tad api spaṣṭaṃ vispaṣṭārthaṃ vivarjayet ||
satyā bhāṣā na bhavati yady api syāt pratiṣṭhitā |
bahiś ced bhraśyate dharmān niyatād vyavahārikāt ||
ākulaṃ ca kriyādānaṃ kriyā caivākulā bhavet ||
rāgādīnāṃ yad ekena kopitaḥ karaṇe vadet |
tad ādau tu likhet sarvaṃ vādinaḥ phalakādiṣu ||
tasmād anyad vyapohyaṃ syād vādinaḥ phalakādiṣu ||
vādibhyām abhyanujñātaṃ śeṣaṃ ca phalake sthitam |
sasākṣikaṃ likheyus te pratipattiṃ ca vādinoḥ ||
vādibhyāṃ likhitāc cheṣaṃ yat punar vādinā smṛtam |
tat pratyākalitaṃ nāma svapāde tasya likhyate ||
yo na bhrātā na ca pitā na putro na niyogakṛt |
vādasaṅkramaṇāj jñeyo hīnavādī sa vai naraḥ ||
abhiyoktā diśed deśyaṃ pratyavaskandito na cet ||
kriyāpi dvividhā proktā mānuṣī daivikī tathā |
divā kṛte kāryavidhau grāmeṣu nagareṣu vā |
sambhave sākṣiṇāṃ caiva divyā na bhavati kriyā ||
gandhamālyam adattaṃ tu bhūṣaṇaṃ vāsa eva vā |
pādukā-iti rājā-uktaṃ tad ākrāman vadham arhati ||
paṇyamūlyaṃ bhṛtir nyāso daṇḍo yac cāvahārakam |
teṣāṃ jihvāṃ samutkṛtya rājā śūle vidhāpayet ||

ādhiḥ pattraṃ vikrayo vā
                            krayo vā |
śuddheṣu sākṣiṣu tataḥ paścāt sākṣyaṃ viśodhayet ||
pakṣān utsārya kāryas tu sabhyaiḥ kāryaviniścayaḥ |
sabhair eva jitaḥ paścād rājñā śāsyaḥ svaśāstrataḥ |
jayine cāpi deyaṃ syād yathāvaj jayapatrakam ||
mukhaśuddhau hi śuddhiḥ syād vyavahārasya nānyathā ||

bruvāṇas tv anyathā sabhyas tad eva-ubhayam āpnuyāt || 2
                            ||
rājā tu dhārmikān sabhyān niyuñjyāt suparīkṣitān |
vyavahāradhuraṃ voḍhuṃ ye śaktāḥ sadgavā iva || 3 ||
samāḥ śatrau ca mitre ca nṛpateḥ syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ || 4 ||
tatpratiṣṭhaḥ smṛto dharmo dharmamūlaś ca pārthivaḥ |
saha sadbhir ato rājā vyavahārān viśodhayet || 5 ||

śuddhiś ca teṣāṃ dharmād dhi dharmam eva vadet tataḥ || 6
                            ||
yatra dharmo hy adharmeṇa satyaṃ yatrānṛtena ca |
viddho dharmo hy adharmeṇa sabhāṃ yatra-upatiṣṭhate |
na ced viśalyaḥ kriyate viddhās tatra sabhāsadaḥ || 8 ||
sabhā vā na praveṣṭavyā vaktavyaṃ vā samañjasam |
abruvan vibruvan vāpi naro bhavati kilbiṣī || 9 ||
ye tu sabhyāḥ sabhāṃ gatvā tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate |
pādaḥ sabhāsadaḥ sarvān pādo rājānam ṛcchati || 11 ||
rājā bhavaty anenās tu mucyante ca sabhāsadaḥ |
eno gacchati kartāraṃ nindārho yatra nindyate || 12 ||
parokṣam arthavaikalyād bhāṣate yaḥ sabhāṃ gataḥ || 13 ||
vacas tathāvidhaṃ brūyād yathā na narakaṃ patet || 14 ||
yathā śalyaṃ bhiṣag vidvān uddhared yantrayuktitaḥ |
yatra sabhyo janaḥ sarvaḥ sādhv etad iti manyate |

sa niḥśalyo vivādaḥ syāt saśalyaḥ syād ato 'nyathā || 16
                            ||
na sā sabhā yatra na santi vṛddhā

vṛddhā na te ye na
                            vadanti dharmam |
nāsau dharmo yatra na satyam asti
ṛṇaṃ deyam adeyaṃ ca yena yatra yathā ca yat |
pitary uparate putrā ṛṇaṃ dadyur yathāṃśataḥ |
vibhaktā hy avibhaktā vā yas tām udvahate dhuram || 2 ||
pitṛvyeṇāvibhaktena bhrātrā vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛtam |

mātrā vā yat kuṭumbārthe dadyus tad rikthino 'khilam || 3
                            ||
kramād avyāhataṃ prāptaṃ putrair yan narṇam uddhṛtam |
dadyuḥ paitāmahaṃ pautrās tac caturthān nivartate || 4 ||
icchanti pitaraḥ putrān svārthahetor yatas tataḥ |
ataḥ putreṇa jātena svārtham utsṛjya yatnataḥ |
pitā mokṣitavya ṛṇād yathā na narakaṃ patet || 6 ||
tapasvī cāgnihotrī ca ṛṇavān mriyate yadi |
tapaś caivāgnihotraṃ ca sarvaṃ tad dhanināṃ dhanam || 7 ||
na putrarṇaṃ pitā dadyād dadyāt putras tu paitṛkam |
pitur eva niyogād yat kuṭumbabharaṇāya ca |
kṛtaṃ vā yad ṛṇaṃ kṛcchre dadyāt putrasya tat pitā || 9 ||
nārvāg viṃśatimād varṣāt pitari proṣite sutaḥ |
ṛṇaṃ dadyāt pitṛvye vā jyeṣṭhe bhrātary athāpi vā || 11 ||
dāpyaḥ pararṇam eko 'pi jīvatsv adhikṛtaiḥ kṛtam |
preteṣu tu na tatputraḥ pararṇaṃ dātum arhati || 12 ||
na strī patikṛtaṃ dadyād ṛṇaṃ putrakṛtaṃ tathā |
abhyupetād ṛte yadvā saha patyā kṛtaṃ bhavet || 13 ||
dadyād aputrā vidhavā niyuktā yā mumūrṣuṇā |
yo vā tadriktham ādadyād yato riktham ṛṇaṃ tataḥ || 14 ||
na ca bhāryākṛtam ṛṇaṃ kathañcit patyur ābhavet |
āpatkṛtād ṛte puṃsāṃ kuṭumbārtho hi vistaraḥ || 15 ||
teṣāṃ tatpratyayā vṛttiḥ kuṭumbaṃ ca tadāśrayam || 16 ||
putriṇī tu samutsṛjya putraṃ strī yānyam āśrayet |
ṛkthaṃ tasyā haret sarvaṃ niḥsvāyāḥ putra eva tu || 17 ||
yā tu sapradhanaiva strī sāpatyā cānyam āśrayet |

so 'syā dadyād ṛṇaṃ bhartur utsṛjed vā tathaiva tām || 18
                            ||
adhanasya hy aputrasya mṛtasyopaiti yaḥ striyam |
ṛṇaṃ voḍhuḥ sa bhajate tad evāsya dhanaṃ smṛtam || 19 ||
uttamā svairiṇī yā syād uttamā ca punarbhuvām |
ṛṇaṃ tayoḥ patikṛtaṃ dadyād yas tām upāśnute || 21 ||
etāny api pramāṇāni bhartā yady anumanyate |
putraḥ patyur abhāve vā rājā vā patiputrayoḥ || 23 ||
bhartrā prītena yad dattaṃ striyai tasmin mṛte 'pi tat |
sā yathākāmam aśnīyād dadyād vā sthāvarād ṛte || 24 ||
anyatra svāmisandeśān na dāsaḥ prabhur ātmanaḥ || 25 ||
putreṇa ca kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ yat syāt pitur anicchataḥ |
tad apy akṛtam evāhur dāsaḥ putraś ca tau samau || 26 ||
aprāptavyavahāraś cet svatantro 'pi hi na rṇabhāk |

svātantryaṃ tu smṛtaṃ jyeṣṭhe jyaiṣṭhyaṃ guṇavayaḥkṛtam || 27
                            ||
trayaḥ svatantrā loke 'smin rājācāryas tathaiva ca |
prati prati ca varṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ svagṛhe gṛhī || 28 ||
asvatantraḥ smṛtaḥ śiṣya ācārye tu svatantratā || 29 ||
asvatantrāḥ striyaḥ putrā dāsāś ca saparigrahāḥ |
svatantras tatra tu gṛhī yasya yat syāt kramāgatam || 30 ||
garbhasthaiḥ sadṛśo jñeya ā varṣād aṣṭamāc chiṣuḥ |
bāla ā ṣoḍaśāj jñeyaḥ pogaṇḍaś cāpi śabdyate || 31 ||
abhāve bījino mātā tadabhāve tu pūrvajaḥ || 33 ||
anuśiṣṭau visarge ca vikraye ceśvarā matāḥ || 34 ||
yad bālaḥ kurute kāryam asvatantras tathaiva ca |
akṛtaṃ tad iti prāhuḥ śāstre śāstravido janāḥ || 35 ||
svatantro 'pi hi yat kāryaṃ kuryād aprakṛtiṃ gataḥ |
tad apy akṛtam evāhur asvatantraḥ sa hetutaḥ || 36 ||
rāgadveṣaparītāś ca jñeyās tv aprakṛtiṃ gatāḥ || 37 ||
kule jyeṣṭhas tathā śreṣṭhaḥ prakṛtisthaś ca yo bhavet |
tatkṛtaṃ syāt kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ nāsvatantrakṛtaṃ kṛtam || 38 ||
dhanamūlāḥ kriyāḥ sarvā yatnas tatsādhane mataḥ |
rakṣaṇaṃ vardhanaṃ bhoga iti tasya vidhiḥ kramāt || 39 ||
tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ śuklaṃ śabalam eva ca |
kṛṣṇaṃ ca tasya vijñeyaḥ prabhedaḥ saptadhā pṛthak || 40 ||
dhanaṃ saptavidhaṃ śuklam udayo 'py asya tadvidhaḥ || 41 ||
vyājenopārjitaṃ yac ca tat kṛṣṇaṃ samudāhṛtam || 43 ||
tena krayo vikrayaś ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca |
vividhāś ca pravartante kriyāḥ sambhoga eva ca || 44 ||
tathāvidham avāpnoti sa phalaṃ pretya ceha ca || 45 ||
sādhāraṇaṃ syāt trividhaṃ śeṣaṃ navavidhaṃ smṛtam || 46 ||
kramāgataṃ prītidāyaḥ prāptaṃ ca saha bhāryayā |
yuddhopalabdhaṃ kāraś ca daṇḍaś ca vyavahārataḥ || 49 ||
sarveṣām eva varṇānām eṣa dharmyo dhanāgamaḥ |
viparyayād adharmyaḥ syān na ced āpad garīyasī || 51 ||
vaiśyavṛttis tataś coktā na jaghanyā kathañcana || 52 ||
na kathañcana kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ karma vārṣalam |
vṛṣalaḥ karma na brāhmaṃ patanīye hi te tayoḥ || 53 ||
utkṛṣṭaṃ cāpakṛṣṭaṃ ca tayoḥ karma na vidyate |
madhyame karmaṇī hitvā sarvasādhāraṇe hi te || 54 ||
āpadaṃ brāhmaṇas tīrtvā kṣatravṛttyā hṛtair dhanaiḥ |
utsṛjet kṣatravṛttiṃ tāṃ kṛtvā pāvanam ātmanaḥ || 55 ||
tasyām eva tu yo vṛttau brāhmaṇo ramate rasāt |
brāhmaṇasya tu vikreyaṃ śuṣkaṃ dāru tṛṇāni ca |
svayaṃ śīrṇaṃ ca vidalaṃ phalānāṃ badareṅgude |
rajjuḥ kārpāsikaṃ sūtraṃ tac ced avikṛtaṃ bhavet || 61 ||
yady avaśyaṃ tu vikreyās tilā dhānyena tatsāmāḥ || 62 ||
mārge punar avasthāpya rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā || 63 ||
, Chapter iv. On Evidence by Writing
likhitaṃ sākṣiṇo bhuktiḥ pramāṇaṃ trividhaṃ smṛtaṃ |
likhitaṃ balavan nityaṃ jīvantas tv eva sākṣiṇaḥ |
pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ guru jñeyaṃ bhuktir ebhyo garīyasī || 67 ||
vidyamāne 'pi likhite jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu |

viśeṣataḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ yan na bhuktaṃ na tat sthiram || 68
                            ||
bhujyamānān parair arthān yaḥ svān maurkhyād upekṣate |
samakṣaṃ jīvato 'py asya tān bhuktiḥ kurute vaśe || 69 ||
yatkiñcid daśa varṣāṇi sannidhau prekṣate dhanī |
bhujyamānaṃ parais tūṣṇīṃ na sa tal labdhum arhati || 70 ||
upekṣāṃ kurvatas tasya tūṣṇīṃ bhūtasya tiṣṭhataḥ |
ajaḍaś ced apogaṇḍo viṣaye cāsya bhujyate |
bhuktaṃ tad vyavahāreṇa bhoktā tad dhanam arhati || 72 ||
strīdhanaṃ ca narendrāṇāṃ na kadācana jīryate |
nirbhogo yatra dṛśyeta na dṛśyetāgamaḥ kvacit |
āgamaḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra na bhogas tatra kāraṇam || 76 ||
anāgamaṃ bhujyate yan na tad bhogo 'tivartate |
prete tu bhoktari dhanaṃ yāti tadvaṃśyabhogyatām || 77 ||

bhuktir eva viśuddhiḥ syāt prāptānāṃ pitṛtaḥ kramāt || 78
                            ||
apratyakṣaṃ ca yad bhuktaṃ ṣaḍ etāny āgamaṃ vinā || 79 ||

putreṇa so 'rthaḥ saṃśodhyo na taṃ bhogo 'tivartate || 80
                            ||
yad vināgamam apy ūrdhvaṃ bhuktaṃ pūrvais tribhir bhavet |
na tac chakyam apākartuṃ kramāt tripuruṣāgatam || 81 ||
santo 'pi na pramāṇaṃ syur mṛte dhanini sākṣiṇaḥ |
anyatra śrāvitaṃ yat syāt svayam āsannamṛtyunā || 82 ||
na hi pratyarthini prete pramāṇaṃ sākṣiṇāṃ vacaḥ |
sākṣimat karaṇaṃ tatra pramāṇaṃ syād viniścaye || 83 ||
śrāvitas tv ātureṇāpi yas tv artho dharmasaṃhitaḥ |
mṛte 'pi tatra sākṣī syāt ṣaṭsu cānvāhitādiṣu || 84 ||
tat kusīdam iti proktaṃ tena vṛttiḥ kusīdinām || 86 ||
kāyikā kālikā caiva kāritā ca tathā smṛtā |
cakravṛddhiś ca śāstreṣu tasya vṛddhiś caturvidhā || 87 ||
pratimāsaṃ sravati yā vṛddhiḥ sā kālikā smṛtā || 88 ||
vṛddhiḥ sā kāritā nāma ya rṇikena svayaṅkṛtā |
vṛddher api punar vṛddhiś cakravṛddhir udāhṛtā || 89 ||
deśācāravidhis tv anyo yatra rṇam avatiṣṭhati || 90 ||
anyeṣāṃ caiva sarveṣām iṣṭakānāṃ tathaiva ca |
akṣayyā vṛddhir eteṣāṃ manur āha prajāpatiḥ || 94 ||
vṛddhir aṣṭaguṇā jñeyā guḍasya lavaṇasya ca || 95 ||
na vṛddhiḥ prītidattānāṃ syād anākāritā kvacit |
vṛddhis tu yoktā dhānyānāṃ vārdhuṣyaṃ tad udāhṛtam || 97 ||
āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu brāhmaṇasya na vārdhuṣam || 98 ||
brāhmaṇasya tu yad deyaṃ sānvayasya na cāsti saḥ |
yadā tu na svakulyāḥ syur na ca sambandhibāndhavāḥ |

tadā dadyāt svajātibhyas teṣv asatsv apsu nikṣipet || 100
                            ||
lekhyaṃ dadyād ṛṇe śuddhe tadabhāve pratiśravam |
viśrambhahetū dvāv atra pratibhūr ādhir eva ca |
likhitaṃ sākṣiṇaś ca dve pramāṇe vyaktikārake || 103 ||

trividhaḥ pratibhūr dṛṣṭas triṣv evārtheṣu sūribhiḥ || 104
                            ||
pratibhūs tad ṛṇaṃ dadyād anupasthāpayaṃs tathā || 105 ||
bahavaś cet pratibhuvo dadyus te 'rthaṃ yathākṛtam |
arthe 'viśeṣite hy eṣu dhaninaś chandataḥ kriyā || 106 ||
adhikriyata ity ādhiḥ sa vijñeyo dvilakṣaṇaḥ |
sa punar dvividhaḥ prokto gopyo bhogyas tathaiva ca |
pramādād dhaninas tadvad ādhau vikṛtim āgate |
ādhir anyo 'dhikartavyo deyaṃ vā dhanine dhanam || 111 ||
śakyaprekṣam ṛṇaṃ dāpyaḥ kāle kāle yathodayam || 112 ||
śakto vā yadi daurātmyān na dadyād dhanine dhanam |
rājñā dāpayitavyaḥ syād gṛhītvāṃśaṃ tu viṃśakam || 113 ||
lekhyaṃ tu dvividhaṃ jñeyaṃ svahastānyakṛtaṃ tathā |
asākṣimat sākṣimac ca siddhir deśasthites tayoḥ || 115 ||

tad apy apārthaṃ likhitam ṛte tv ādheḥ sthirāśrayāt || 118
                            ||
ādhir yo dvividhaḥ prokto jaṅgamaḥ sthāvaras tathā |
siddhir atrobhayasyāsya bhogo yady asti nānyathā || 119 ||
darśitaṃ pratikālaṃ yac chrāvitaṃ śrāvitaṃ ca yat |
lekhyaṃ sidhyati sarvatra mṛteṣv api hi sākṣiṣu || 120 ||
na lekhyaṃ siddhim āpnoti jīvatsv api hi sākṣiṣu || 121 ||
yasmin syāt saṃśayo lekhye bhūtābhūtakṛte kvacit |
sākṣibhyo likhitaṃ śreyo likhitena tu sākṣiṇaḥ || 125 ||

kartavyam anyal lekhyaṃ syād eṣa lekhyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 126
                            ||

, Chapter v. On Evidence by Witnesses
                        ...
śrotrasya yat paro brūte cakṣuṣaḥ kāyakarma yat || 128 ||
ekādaśavidhaḥ sākṣī sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ |
likhitaḥ smāritaś caiva yadṛcchābhijña eva ca |
gūḍhaś cottarasākṣī ca sākṣī pañcavidhaḥ smṛtaḥ || 130 ||
grāmaś ca prāḍvivākaś ca rājā ca vyavahāriṇām || 131 ||
kāryeṣv abhyantaro yaḥ syād arthinā prahitaś ca yaḥ |
brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā ye cāpy aninditāḥ |
prativarṇaṃ bhaveyus te sarve sarveṣu vā punaḥ || 134 ||
bahirvāsiṣu bāhyāś ca striyaḥ striṣu ca sākṣiṇaḥ || 135 ||
śreṇyādiṣu tu vargeṣu kaścic ced dveṣyatām iyāt |
tebhya eva na sākṣī syād dveṣṭāraḥ sarva eva te || 136 ||
asākṣy api hi śāstreṣu dṛṣṭaḥ pañcavidho budhaiḥ |
bhedād vipratipattiḥ syād vivāde yatra sākṣiṇaḥ || 138 ||
svayamukter anirdiṣṭaḥ svayam evaitya yo vadet |
śrotriyās tāpasā vṛddhā ye ca pravrajitā narāḥ |
asākṣiṇas te vacanān nātra hetur udāhṛtaḥ || 140 ||
stenāḥ sāhasikāś caṇḍāḥ kitavā vadhakās tathā |
asākṣiṇas te duṣṭatvāt teṣu satyaṃ na vidyate || 141 ||
vacanaṃ yatra bhidyate te syur bhedād asākṣiṇaḥ || 142 ||
anirdiṣṭas tu sākṣitve svayam evaitya yo vadet |
sūcīty uktaḥ sa śāstreṣu na sa sākṣitvam arhati || 143 ||
yo 'rthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini |
kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ || 144 ||
yo 'rthaḥ śrāvayitavyaḥ syāt tasminn asati cārthini |

kva tad vadatu sākṣitvam ity asākṣī mṛtāntaraḥ || 144-1
                            ||
dvayor vivadator arthe dvayoḥ satsu ca sākṣiṣu |
pūrvapakṣo bhaved yasya bhaveyus tasya sākṣiṇaḥ || 145 ||
ādharyaṃ pūrvapakṣasya yasminn arthe vaśād bhavet |
na pareṇa samuddiṣṭam upeyāt sākṣiṇaṃ rahaḥ |
bhedayet taṃ na cānyena hīyetaivaṃ samācaran || 147 ||
sākṣy uddiṣṭo yadi preyād gacched vāpi digantaram |

tacchrotāraḥ pramāṇaṃ syuḥ pramāṇaṃ hy uttarakriyā || 148
                            ||
jānatā cātmanā lekhyaṃ ajānānas tu lekhayet || 149 ||
ā pañcamāt tathā siddhir yadṛcchopagatasya tu || 150 ||
ā tṛtīyāt tathā varṣāt siddhir gūḍhasya sākṣiṇaḥ |
ā vai saṃvatsarāt siddhiṃ vadanty uttarasākṣiṇaḥ || 151 ||
athavā kālaniyamo na dṛṣṭaḥ sākṣiṇaṃ prati |
smṛtyapekṣaṃ hi sākṣitvam āhuḥ śāstravido janāḥ || 152 ||
yasya nopahatā puṃsaḥ smṛtiḥ śrotraṃ ca nityaśaḥ |
sudīrgheṇāpi kālena sa sākṣī sākṣyam arhati || 153 ||
lakṣaṇāny eva sākṣitvaṃ eṣām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 154 ||
asākṣipratyayā hy ete pāruṣye tu parīkṣaṇam || 157 ||
kaścit kṛtvātmanaś cihnaṃ dveṣāt param upadravet |
nārthasambandhino nāptā na sahāyā na vairiṇaḥ |
na dṛṣṭadoṣāḥ praṣṭavyāś na vyādhyārtā na dūṣitāḥ || 159 ||
vikretā brāhmaṇaś caiva dvijo vārdhuṣikaś ca yaḥ || 168 ||
pitrā vivadamānaś ca bhedakṛc cety asākṣiṇaḥ || 169 ||
pāruṣyayoś cāpy ubhayor na parīkṣeta sākṣiṇaḥ || 171 ||
teṣām api na bālaḥ syān naiko na strī na kūṭakṛt |
na bāndhavo na cārātir brūyus te sākṣyam anyathā || 172 ||
bālo 'jñānād asatyāt strī pāpābhyāsāc ca kūṭakṛt |

asākṣy eko 'pi sākṣitve praṣṭavyaḥ syāt sa saṃsadi || 174
                            ||
yas tv ātmadoṣabhinnatvād asvastha iva lakṣyate |
bhūmiṃ likhati pādābhyāṃ bāhu vāso dhunoti ca || 176 ||

śoṣam āgacchataś coṣṭhāv ūrdhvaṃ tiryak ca vīkṣate || 177
                            ||
kūṭasākṣī sa vijñeyas taṃ pāpaṃ vinayen nṛpaḥ || 178 ||
śrāvayitvā ca yo 'nyebhyaḥ sākṣitvaṃ tad vinihnute |
sa vineyo bhṛśataraṃ kūṭasākṣyadhiko hi saḥ || 179 ||
āhūya sākṣiṇaḥ pṛcchen niyamya śapathair bhṛśam |

gobījakāñcanair vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ sarvais tu pātakaiḥ || 181
                            ||
dīnaḥ śatrugṛhaṃ gacched yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet || 183 ||
amitrān bhūyaśaḥ paśyed yaḥ sākṣyam anṛtaṃ vadet || 184 ||
yāṃ rātrim adhivinnā strī yāṃ caivākṣaparājitaḥ |
yāṃ ca bhārābhitaptāṅgo durvivaktā sa tāṃ vaset || 185 ||
tasya varṣaśate pūrṇe pāśam ekaṃ pramucyate |
evaṃ sa bandhanāt tasmān mucyate niyutāḥ samāḥ || 187 ||
yāvato bāndhavāṃs yasmin hanti sākṣye 'nṛtaṃ vadan |
pañca paśvanṛte hanti daśa hanti gavānṛte |
hanti jātān ajātāṃś ca hiraṇyārthe 'nṛtaṃ vadan |
sarvaṃ bhūmyanṛte hanti mā sma bhūmyanṛtaṃ vadīḥ || 190 ||
ekam evādvitīyaṃ tat prāhuḥ pāvanam ātmanaḥ |
satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva || 191 ||
aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam |
varaṃ kūpaśatād vāpi varaṃ vāpīśatāt kratuḥ |
varaṃ kratuśatāt putraḥ satyaṃ putraśatād varam || 193 ||
satyena vāyuḥ pavate satyenāpaḥ sravanti ca || 194 ||
satyam eva paraṃ dānaṃ satyam eva paraṃ tapaḥ |
satyam eva paro dharmo lokānām iti naḥ śrutam || 195 ||
satyaṃ devāḥ samāsena manuṣyās tv anṛtaṃ smṛtam |
ihaiva tasya devatvaṃ yasya satye sthitā matiḥ || 196 ||
satyaṃ brūhy anṛtaṃ tyaktvā satyena svargam eṣyasi |
nirayeṣu ca te śaśvaj jihvām utkṛtya dāruṇāḥ |
anubhūya ca duḥkhās tāś ciraṃ narakavedanāḥ |
jñātvaitān anṛte doṣāñ jñātvā satye ca sadguṇān |
na bāndhavā na suhṛdo na dhanāni mahānty api |
alaṃ tārayituṃ śaktās tamasy ugre nimajjataḥ || 202 ||
pitaras tv avalambante tvayi sākṣitvam āgate |
satyam ātmā manuṣyasya satye sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
yāṃ ca rātrim ajaniṣṭhā yāṃ rātriṃ ca mariṣyasi |

vṛthā tadantaraṃ te syāt kuryāś cet satyam anyathā || 205
                            ||
nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param |
sākṣidharme viśeṣeṇa satyam eva vadet tataḥ || 206 ||
yaḥ parārthe praharati svāṃ vācaṃ puruṣādhamaḥ |
ātmārthe kiṃ na kuryāt sa pāpo narakanirbhayaḥ || 207 ||
arthā vai vāci niyatā vāṅmūlā vāgviniḥsṛtāḥ |
yo hy etāṃ stenayed vācaṃ sa sarvasteyakṛn naraḥ || 208 ||
nirdiṣṭeṣv arthajāteṣu sākṣī cet sākṣyam āgataḥ |
na brūyād akṣarasamaṃ na tan nigaditaṃ bhavet || 211 ||
yatra vipratipattiḥ syāt sākṣyaṃ tad asad ucyate || 212 ||
ūnam abhyadhikaṃ cārthaṃ prabrūyur yatra sākṣiṇaḥ |
tad apy anuktaṃ vijñeyam eṣa sākṣyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 213 ||
pramādād dhanino yatra na syāl lekhyaṃ na sākṣiṇaḥ |
arthaṃ cāpahnuyād vādī tatroktas trividho vidhiḥ || 214 ||
codanā pratikālaṃ ca yuktileśas tathaiva ca |
tṛtīyaḥ śapathaś coktas tair evaṃ sādhayet kramāt || 215 ||
abhīkṣṇaṃ codyamāno yaḥ pratihanyān na tadvacaḥ |
yuktiṣv apy asamarthāsu śapathair enam ardayet |
dīptāgnir yaṃ na dahati yam antardhārayanty āpaḥ |
sa taraty abhiśāpaṃ taṃ kilbiṣī syād viparyaye || 219 ||
eṣa eva vidhir dṛṣṭaḥ sarvārthāpahnaveṣu ca || 220 ||
śapathā hy api devānām ṛṣīṇām api ca smṛtāḥ |
vasiṣṭhaḥ śapathaṃ śepe yātudhāne tu śaṅkitaḥ || 221 ||
ayuktaṃ sāhasaṃ kṛtvā pratyāpattiṃ bhajeta yaḥ |
brūyāt svayaṃ vā sadasi tasyārdhavinayaḥ smṛtaḥ || 223 ||
gūhamānas tu daurātmyād yadi pāpaṃ sa jīyate |
sabhyāś cātra na tuṣyanti tīvro daṇḍaś ca pātyate || 224 ||
nikṣepo nāma tat proktaṃ vyavahārapadaṃ budhaiḥ || 1 ||
sa punar dvividhaḥ proktaḥ sākṣimān itaras tathā |
yācyamānas tu yo dātrā nikṣepaṃ na prayacchati |
daṇḍyaḥ sa rājñā dāpyaś ca naṣṭe dāpyaś ca tatsamam || 4 ||
yaś cārthaṃ sādhayet tena nikṣeptur ananujñayā |
tatrāpi daṇḍyaḥ sa bhavet tac ca sodayam āvahet || 5 ||
grahītuḥ saha yo 'rthena naṣṭo naṣṭaḥ sa dāyinaḥ |
daivarājakṛte tadvan na cet taj jihmakāritam || 6 ||
pratigṛhṇāti pogaṇḍaṃ yaś ca sapradhanaṃ naraḥ |
tasyāpy eṣa bhaved dharmaḥ ṣaḍ ete vidhayaḥ samāḥ || 8 ||
samo 'tirikto hīno vā yatrāṃśo yasya yādṛśaḥ |
kṣayavyayau tathā vṛddhis tasya tatra tathāvidhāḥ || 3 ||
pramādān nāśitaṃ dāpyaḥ pratiṣiddhakṛtaṃ ca yat |
asandiṣṭaś ca yat kuryāt sarvaiḥ sambhūyakāribhiḥ || 5 ||
yas tat svaśaktyā saṃrakṣet tasyāṃśo daśamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 6 ||
ekasya cet syād vyasanaṃ dāyādo 'sya tad āpnuyāt |
anyo vāsati dāyāde śaktāś cet sarva eva vā || 7 ||
ṛtvijāṃ vyasane 'py evam anyas tat karma nistaret |
ṛtvig yājyam aduṣṭaṃ yas tyajed anapakāriṇam |
aduṣṭaṃ va rtvijaṃ yājyo vineyau tāv ubhāv api || 9 ||
ṛtvik tu trividho dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvajuṣṭaḥ svayaṅkṛtaḥ |
yadṛcchayā ca yaḥ kuryād ārtvijyaṃ prītipūrvakam || 10 ||
kramāgateṣv eṣa dharmo vṛteṣv ṛtvikṣu ca svayam |
yādṛcchike tu saṃyājye tattyāge nāsti kilbiṣam || 11 ||
śulkasthānaṃ vaṇik prāptaḥ śulkaṃ dadyād yathopagam |
na tad vyatihared rājñāṃ balir eṣa prakalpitaḥ || 12 ||
kaścic cet sañcaran deśāt preyād abhyāgato vaṇik |
rājāsya bhāṇḍaṃ tad rakṣet yāvad dāyādadarśanam || 14 ||
dāyāde 'sati bandhubhyo jñātibhyo vā tad arpayet |
tadabhāve suguptaṃ tad dhārayed daśatīḥ samāḥ || 15 ||
rājā tad ātmasāt kuryād evaṃ dharmo na hīyate || 16 ||
dattvā dravyam asamyag yaḥ punar ādātum icchati |
adeyam atha deyaṃ ca dattaṃ cādattam eva ca |
tatra hyaṣṭāv adeyāni deyam ekavidhaṃ smṛtam |
anvāhitaṃ yācitakam ādhiḥ sādhāraṇaṃ ca yat |
nikṣepaḥ putradāraṃ ca sarvasvaṃ cānvaye sati || 4 ||
āpatsv api hi kaṣṭāsu vartamānena dehinā |
adeyāny āhur ācāryā yac cānyasmai pratiśrutam || 5 ||
tad deyam upahṛtyānyad dadad doṣam avāpnuyāt || 6 ||
kartā mamāyaṃ karmeti pratilābhecchayā ca yat || 9 ||
apātre pātram ity ukte kārye cādharmasaṃhite |
yad dattaṃ syād avijñānād adattaṃ tad api smṛtam || 10 ||
gṛhṇāty adattaṃ yo lobhād yaś cādeyaṃ prayacchati |
abhyupetya tu śuśrūṣāṃ yas tāṃ na pratipadyate |
ete karmakarāḥ proktā dāsās tu gṛhajādayaḥ || 3 ||
jātikarmakṛtas tūkto viśeṣo vṛttir eva ca || 4 ||
karmāpi dvividhaṃ jñeyam aśubhaṃ śubham eva ca |
aśubhaṃ karma vijñeyaṃ śubham anyad ataḥ param || 7 ||
ā vidyāgrahaṇāc chiṣyaḥ śuśrūṣet prayato gurum |
nāsandiṣṭaḥ pratiṣṭheta tiṣṭhed vāpi guruṃ kvacit |
sandiṣṭaḥ karma kurvīta śaktaś ced avicārayan || 10 ||
yathākālam adhīyīta yāvan na vimanā guruḥ |
āsīno 'dho guroḥ kūrce phalake vā samāhitaḥ || 11 ||
anuśāsyaś ca guruṇā na ced anuvidhīyate |
bhṛśaṃ na tāḍayed enaṃ nottamāṅge na vakṣasi |
ācāryasya vased ante kālaṃ kṛtvā suniścitam || 15 ||
na cānyat kārayet karma putravac cainam ācaret || 16 ||
śikṣayantam aduṣṭaṃ ca yas tv ācāryaṃ parityajet |
balād vāsayitavyaḥ syād vadhabandhau ca so 'rhati || 17 ||
tatra karma ca yat kuryād ācāryasyaiva tatphalam || 18 ||
uttamas tv āyudhīyo 'tra madhyamas tu kṛṣīvalaḥ |
adhamo bhāravāhaḥ syād ity evaṃ trividho bhṛtaḥ || 21 ||
artheṣv adhikṛto yaḥ syāt kuṭumbasya tathopari |
so 'dhikarmakaro jñeyaḥ sa ca kauṭumbikaḥ smṛtaḥ || 22 ||
gṛhajātas tathā krīto labdho dāyād upāgataḥ |
anākālabhṛtas tadvad ādhattaḥ svāminā ca yaḥ || 24 ||
mokṣito mahataś carṇāt prāpto yuddhāt paṇe jitaḥ |
vikretā cātmanaḥ śāstre dāsāḥ pañcadaśā smṛtāḥ || 26 ||
tatra pūrvaś caturvargo dāsatvān na vimucyate |
yaś caiṣāṃ svāminaṃ kaścin mokṣayet prāṇasaṃśayāt |
dāsatvāt sa vimucyeta putrabhāgaṃ labheta ca || 28 ||

sambhakṣitaṃ yad durbhikṣe na tac chudhyeta karmaṇā || 29
                            ||
ādhatto 'pi dhanaṃ dattvā svāmī yady enam uddharet |
dattvā tu sodayam ṛṇaṃ ṛṇī dāsyāt pramucyate |
tavāham ity upagato yuddhaprāptaḥ paṇe jitaḥ |
rājña eva tu dāsaḥ syāt pravrajyāvasito naraḥ |
na tasya pratimokṣo 'sti na viśuddhiḥ kathañcana || 33 ||
vikrīṇīte ya ātmānaṃ svatantraḥ san narādhamaḥ |
sa jaghanyataras teṣāṃ naiva dāsyāt pramucyate || 35 ||
rājñā mokṣayitavyās te dāsatvaṃ teṣu neṣyate || 36 ||
na sa taṃ prāpnuyāt kāmaṃ pūrvasvāmī labheta tam || 38 ||
adhanās traya evoktā bhāryā dāsas tathā sutaḥ |
yat te samadhigacchanti yasya te tasya tad dhanam || 39 ||
svadāsam icched yaḥ kartum adāsaṃ prītamānasaḥ |
skandhād ādāya tasyāpi bhindyāt kumbhaṃ sahāmbhasā || 40 ||
adāsa iti coktvā triḥ prāṅmukhaṃ tam athotsṛjet || 41 ||
bhojyānnaḥ pratigṛhyaś ca bhavaty abhimataś ca saḥ || 42 ||
ādau madhye 'vasāne vā karmaṇo yad viniścitam || 2 ||
karmopakaraṇaṃ caiṣāṃ kriyāṃ prati yad āhṛtam |
karmākurvan pratiśrutya kāryo dattvā bhṛtiṃ balāt |
adadat kārayitvā tu karmaivaṃ sodayāṃ bhṛtim || 7 ||
dviguṇāṃ tu bhṛtiṃ dāpyaḥ prasthāne vighnam ācaran || 9 ||
dāpyo yat tatra naṣṭaṃ syād daivarājakṛtād ṛte || 10 ||
gavāṃ śatād vatsatarī dhenuḥ syād dviśatād bhṛtiḥ |
cīṛṇāḥ pītāś ca tā gopaḥ sāyāhne pratyupānayet || 12 ||
syāc ced govyasanaṃ gopo vyāyacchet tatra śaktitaḥ |
aśaktas tūrṇam āgamya svāmine tan nivedayet || 13 ||
voḍhum arhati gopas tāṃ vinayaṃ cāpi rājani || 14 ||
ajāvike tathāruddhe vṛkaiḥ pāle tv anāyati |
yat prasahya vṛko hanyāt pāle tatkilbiṣam bhavet || 16 ||
yām utpatya vṛko hanyān na pālas tatra kilbiṣī || 17 ||
vighuṣya tu hṛtaṃ caurair na pālo dātum arhati |
yadi deśe ca kāle ca svāminaḥ svasya śaṃsati || 18 ||
śulkaṃ gṛhītvā paṇyastrī necchantī dvis tad āvahet |
aprayacchaṃs tadā śulkam anubhūya pumān striyam || 20 ||
ayonau kramate yas tu bahubhir vāpi vāsayet |
śulkam aṣṭaguṇaṃ dāpyo vinayas tāvad eva ca || 21 ||
parājire gṛhaṃ kṛtvā stomaṃ dattvā vaset tu yaḥ |
grahītur ābhaved bhagnaṃ naṣṭaṃ cānyatra samplavāt || 23 ||
nikṣiptaṃ vā paradravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ labdhvāpahṛtya vā |

prakāśaṃ krayataḥ śuddhiḥ kretuḥ steyaṃ rahaḥ krayāt || 2
                            ||
asvāmyanumatād dāsād asataś ca janād rahaḥ |
na gūhetāgamaṃ kretā śuddhis tasya tadāgamāt |
vikretā svāmine 'rthaṃ ca kretur mūlyaṃ ca tatkṛtam |
dadyād daṇḍaṃ tathā rājñe vidhir asvāmivikraye || 5 ||
pareṇa nihitaṃ labdhvā rājany upaharen nidhim |
rājagāmī nidhiḥ sarvaḥ sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇād ṛte || 6 ||
brāhmaṇo 'pi nidhiṃ labdhvā kṣipraṃ rājñe nivedayet |
tena dattaṃ ca bhūñjīta stenaḥ syād anivedayan || 7 ||
svam apy arthaṃ tathā naṣṭaṃ labdhvā rājñe nivedayet |

gṛhṇīyāt tatra taṃ śuddham aśuddhaṃ syāt tato 'nyathā || 8
                            ||
vikrīya paṇyaṃ mūlyena kretur yan na pradīyate |
loke 'smin dvividhaṃ dravyaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ tathā |
ṣaḍvidhas tasya tu budhair dānādānavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
gaṇimaṃ tulimaṃ meyaṃ kriyayā rūpataḥ śriyā || 3 ||
vikrīya paṇyaṃ mūlyena kretur yo na prayacchati |
arghaś ced apahīyeta sodayaṃ paṇyam āvahet |
nirdoṣaṃ darśayitvā tu sadoṣaṃ yaḥ prayacchati |
mūlyaṃ taddviguṇaṃ dāpyo vinayaṃ tāvad eva ca || 7 ||
so 'pi taddviguṇaṃ dāpyo vineyas tāvad eva ca || 8 ||
dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāti krītaṃ paṇyaṃ ca yaḥ krayī |
sa ca lābho 'rgham āsādya mahān bhavati vā na vā || 11 ||
tasmād deśe ca kāle ca vaṇig arghaṃ parākramet |
na jihmena pravarteta śreyān evaṃ vaṇikpathaḥ || 12 ||
krītvā mūlyena yaḥ paṇyaṃ kretā na bahu manyate |
krītvā mūlyena yat paṇyaṃ duṣkrītaṃ manyate krayī |
vikretuḥ pratideyaṃ tat tasminn evāhny avikṣatam || 2 ||
dvitīye 'hni dadat kretā mūlyāt triṃśāṃśam āvahet |
dviguṇaṃ tat tṛtīye 'hni parataḥ kretur eva tat || 3 ||
kretā paṇyaṃ parīkṣeta prāk svayaṃ guṇadoṣataḥ |
parīkṣyābhimataṃ krītaṃ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ || 4 ||
tryahād dohyaṃ parīkṣeta pañcāhād vāhyam eva tu |
dvipadām ardhamāsaṃ syāt puṃsāṃ taddviguṇaṃ striyāḥ |
paribhuktaṃ ca yad vāsaḥ kliṣṭarūpaṃ malīmasam |
sadoṣam api vikrītaṃ vikretur na bhavet punaḥ || 7 ||

dviḥ pādas tris tribhāgas tu catuḥkṛtvo 'rdham eva ca || 8
                            ||
suvarṇasya kṣayo nāsti rajate dvipalaṃ śatam |
śatam aṣṭapalaṃ jñeyaṃ kṣayas syāt trapusīsayoḥ || 11 ||
tāmre pañcapalaṃ vidyād vikārā ye ca tanmayāḥ |
kauṣeyavalkalānāṃ tu naiva vṛddhir na ca kṣayaḥ || 15 ||
vṛddhikṣayau tu jānīyāt paṇyānām āgamaṃ tathā || 16 ||
saṃrakṣet samayaṃ rājā durge janapade tathā || 2 ||
yo dharmaḥ karma yac caiṣām upasthānavidhiś ca yaḥ |
yac caiṣāṃ vṛttyupādānam anumanyeta tat tathā || 3 ||
pratikūlaṃ ca yad rājñaḥ prakṛtyavamataṃ ca yat |
bādhakaṃ ca yad arthānāṃ tat tebhyo vinivartayet || 4 ||
parasparopaghātaṃ ca teṣāṃ rājā na marṣayet || 5 ||
pṛthag gaṇāṃś ca ye bhindyus te vineyā viśeṣataḥ |
āvaheyur bhayaṃ ghoraṃ vyādhivat te hy upekṣitāḥ || 6 ||
pravṛttam api tad rājā śreyaskāmo nivartayet || 7 ||
kṣetrādhikārā yatra syur vivādaḥ kṣetrajas tu saḥ || 1 ||
grāmasīmāsu ca bahir ye syus tatkṛṣijīvinaḥ |
atha ced anṛtaṃ brūyuḥ sāmantās tadviniścaye |
sarve pṛthak pṛthag daṇḍyā rājñā madhyamasāhasam || 7 ||
gaṇavṛddhādayas tv anye daṇḍaṃ dāpyāḥ pṛthak pṛthak |
naikaḥ samunnayet sīmāṃ naraḥ pratyayavān api |
gurutvād asya dharmasya kriyaiṣā bahuṣu sthitā || 9 ||
ekaś ced unnayet sīmāṃ sopavāsaḥ samāhitaḥ |
yadā ca na syur jñātāraḥ sīmāyā na ca lakṣaṇam |
tadā rājā dvayoḥ sīmām uddhared iṣṭataḥ svayam || 11 ||
parakṣetrasya madhye tu setur na pratiṣidhyate |
mahāguṇo 'lpabādhaś ca vṛddhir iṣṭā kṣaye sati || 14 ||
setus tu dvididho jñeyaḥ kheyo bandhyas tathaiva ca |
ya evānudake doṣaḥ sa evābhyudake smṛtaḥ || 16 ||
pūrvapravṛttam utsannam apṛṣṭvā svāminaṃ tu yaḥ |
setuṃ pravartayet kaścin na sa tatphalabhāg bhavet || 17 ||
mṛte tu svāmini punas tadvaṃśye vāpi mānave |
rājānam āmantrya tataḥ prakuryāt setukarma tat || 18 ||
iṣavas tasya naśyanti yo viddham anuvidhyati || 19 ||
kṣetraṃ ced vikṛṣet kaścid aśnuvīta sa tatphalam || 20 ||
vikṛṣyamāṇe kṣetre cet kṣetrikaḥ punar āvrajet |
khilopacāraṃ tat sarvaṃ dattvā svakṣetram āpnuyāt || 21 ||

samprāpte tv aṣṭame varṣe bhuktaṃ kṣetraṃ labheta saḥ || 22
                            ||
kṣetraṃ tripuruṣaṃ yat syād gṛhaṃ vā syāt kramāgatam |
rājaprasādād anyatra na tadbhogaḥ paraṃ nayet || 24 ||
utkramya tu vṛtiṃ yatra sasyaghāto gavādibhiḥ |
pālaḥ śāsyo bhavet tatra na cec chaktyā nivārayet || 25 ||
vadhena pālo mucyeta daṇḍaṃ svāmini pātayet || 26 ||
nivāryās tu prayatnena teṣāṃ svāmī na daṇḍabhāk || 27 ||
māṣaṃ gāṃ dāpayed daṇḍaṃ dvau māṣau mahiṣīṃ tathā |
ajāvike savatse tu daṇḍaḥ syād ardhamāṣakaḥ || 28 ||
adaṇḍyā hastino 'śvāś ca prajāpālā hi te smṛtāḥ |
adaṇḍyā garbhiṇī gauś ca sūtikā cābhisāriṇī || 29 ||
proktas tu dvir niṣaṇṇānāṃ vasantyāṃ tu caturguṇam |
yā naṣṭāḥ pāladoṣeṇa gāvaḥ kṣetraṃ samāśritāḥ |
na tatra gomino daṇḍaḥ pālas taṃ daṇḍam arhati || 31 ||
atha sarpeṇa daṣṭo vā giry agrāt patito 'pi vā || 32 ||
na tatra doṣaḥ pālasya na ca doṣo 'sti gominām || 33 ||
gobhis tu bhakṣitaṃ dhānyaṃ yo naraḥ pratimārgati |
sāmantasya śado deyo dhānyaṃ yat tatra vāpitam |
gavatraṃ gomine deyaṃ dhānyaṃ tatkarṣikasya tu || 34 ||
grāmopānte ca yat kṣetraṃ vivītānte mahāpathe |
anāvṛte cet tannāśe na pālasya vyatikramaḥ || 35 ||
pathi kṣetre vṛtiḥ kāryā yām uṣṭro nāvalokayet |
na laṅghayet paśur nāśvo na bhidyād yāṃ ca sūkaraḥ || 36 ||
gṛhaṃ kṣetraṃ ca vijñeyaṃ vāsahetuḥ kuṭumbinām |
tasmāt tan nākṣiped rājā tad dhi mūlaṃ kuṭumbinām || 37 ||
vṛddhe janapade rājño dharmaḥ kośaś ca vardhate |
hīyate hīyamāne ca vṛddhihetum ataḥ śrayet || 38 ||
vivāhādividhiḥ strīṇāṃ yatra puṃsāṃ ca kīrtyate |
strīpuṃsayos tu sambandhād varaṇaṃ prāg vidhīyate |
svajātyā śreyasī bhāryā svajātyaś ca patiḥ striyāḥ || 4 ||
vaiśyāyā dvau patī jñeyāv eko 'nyaḥ kṣatriyāpatiḥ || 6 ||
ā saptamāt pañcamād vā bandhubhyaḥ pitṛmātṛtāḥ |
pumāṃś ced avikalpena sa kanyāṃ labdhum arhati || 8 ||
viṭ cāsya plavate nāpsu hlādi mūtraṃ ca phenilam |
pumān syāṃl lakṣaṇair etair viparītais tu paṇḍakaḥ || 10 ||
caturdaśavidhaḥ śāstre sa tu dṛṣṭo manīṣibhiḥ |
cikitsyaś cācikitsyaś ca teṣām ukto vidhiḥ kramāt || 11 ||
nisargapaṇḍo vadhriś ca pakṣapaṇḍas tathaiva ca |
abhiśāpād guro rogād devakrodhāt tathaiva ca || 12 ||
īrṣyāpaṇḍaś ca sevyaś ca vātaretā mukhebhagaḥ |
patir anyaḥ smṛto nāryā vatsaraṃ sampratīkṣya tu || 16 ||
anyasyām yo manuṣyaḥ syād amanuṣyaḥ svayoṣiti |
labheta sānyaṃ bhartāram etat kāryaṃ prajāpateḥ || 18 ||
apatyārthaṃ striyaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ strī kṣetraṃ bījinaḥ prajāḥ |
kṣetraṃ bījavate deyaṃ nābījī kṣetram arhati || 19 ||
pitā dadyāt svayaṃ kanyām bhrātā vānumate pituḥ |
mātāmaho mātulaś ca sakulyā bāndhavās tathā || 20 ||
mātābhāve tu sarveṣāṃ prakṛtau yadi vartate |
yadā tu naiva kaścit syāt kanyā rājānam āvrajet |
anujñayā tasya varaṃ pratītya varayet svayam || 22 ||
saha dharmaṃ caret tena putrāṃś cotpādayet tataḥ || 23 ||
pratigṛhya ca yaḥ kanyāṃ naro deśāntaraṃ vrajet |
trīn ṛtūn samatikramya kanyānyaṃ varayed varam || 24 ||

te cen na dadyus tāṃ bhartre te syur bhrūṇahabhiḥ samāḥ || 25
                            ||
yāvantaś ca rtavas tasyāḥ samatītā patiṃ vinā |
tāvatyo bhrūṇahatyāḥ syus tasya yo na dadāti tām || 26 ||
ato 'pravṛtte rajasi kanyāṃ dadyāt pitā sakṛt |
mahad enaḥ spṛśed enam anyathaiṣa vidhiḥ satām || 27 ||
sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate |
sakṛd āha dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛt || 28 ||
brāhmādiṣu vivāheṣu pañcasv eṣu vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
guṇāpekṣaṃ bhaved dānam āsurādiṣu ca triṣu || 29 ||
kanyāyām prāptaśulkāyāṃ jyāyāṃś ced vara āvrajet |
nāduṣṭāṃ dūṣayet kanyāṃ nāduṣṭaṃ dūṣayed varam |
doṣe tu sati nāgaḥ syād anyonyaṃ tyajatos tayoḥ || 31 ||
dattvā nyāyena yaḥ kanyāṃ varāya na dadāti tām |
aduṣṭaś ced varo rājñā sa daṇḍyas tatra coravat || 32 ||
yas tu doṣavatīṃ kanyām anākhyāya prayacchati |
akanyeti tu yaḥ kanyāṃ brūyād dveṣeṇa mānavaḥ |
sa śataṃ prāpnuyād daṇḍaṃ tasyā doṣam adarśayan || 34 ||
pratigṛhya tu yaḥ kanyām aduṣṭām utsṛjed varaḥ |
vineyaḥ so 'py akāmo 'pi kanyāṃ tām eva codvahet || 35 ||
kanyādoṣau ca yau pūrvau eṣa doṣagaṇo vare || 37 ||
brāhmas tu prathamas teṣāṃ prājāpatyas tathaiva ca || 38 ||
ārṣaś caivātha daivaś ca gāndharvaś cāsuras tathā |

rākṣaso 'nantaras tasmāt paiśācas tv aṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ || 39
                            ||
satkṛtyāhūya kanyāṃ tu brāhme dadyād tv alaṅkṛtām |
saha dharmaṃ carety uktvā prājāpatyo vidhīyate || 40 ||
vastragomithune dattvā vivāhas tv ārṣa ucyate |
antarvedyāṃ tu daivaḥ syād ṛtvije karma kurvate || 41 ||
icchantīm icchate prāhur gāndharvo nāma pañcamam |
prasahya haraṇād ukto vivāho rākṣasas tathā |
eṣāṃ tu dharmyās catvāro brāhmādyāḥ samudāhṛtāḥ |

sādhāraṇaḥ syād gāndharvas trayo 'dharmyās tv ataḥ pare || 44
                            ||
parapūrvāḥ striyas tv anyāḥ sapta proktā yathākramam |
punarbhūs trividhā tāsāṃ svairiṇī tu caturvidhā || 45 ||
punarbhūḥ prathamā soktā punaḥ saṃskāram arhati || 46 ||
kaumāraṃ patim utsṛjya yānyaṃ puruṣam āśritā |
punaḥ patyur gṛham yāyāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā || 47 ||
asatsu devareṣu strī bāndhavair yā pradīyate |
strī prasūtāprasūtā vā patyāv eva tu jīvati |
kāmāt samāśrayed anyaṃ prathamā svairiṇī tu sā || 49 ||
mṛte bhartari yā prāptān devarān apy apāsya tu |
upagacchet paraṃ kāmāt sā dvitīyā prakīrtitā || 50 ||
prāptā deśād dhanakrītā kṣutpipāsāturā ca yā |
tavāham ity upagatā sā tṛtīyā prakīrtitā || 51 ||
deśadharmān apekṣya strī gurubhir yā pradīyate |
punarbhuvāṃ eṣa vidhiḥ svairiṇīnāṃ ca kīrtitaḥ |
apatyam utpādayitus tāsāṃ yā śulkato hṛtā |
kṣetrikasya yad ajñātaṃ kṣetre bījaṃ pradīyate |
na tatra bījino bhāgaḥ kṣetrikasyaiva tad bhavet || 55 ||

phalabhug yasya tat kṣetraṃ na bījī phalabhāg bhavet || 56
                            ||
mahokṣo janayed vatsān yasya goṣu vraje caran |
tasya te yasya tā gāvo moghaṃ syanditam ārṣabham || 57 ||
narte kṣetraṃ bhavet sasyaṃ na ca bījaṃ vināsti tat |
ato 'patyaṃ dvayor iṣṭaṃ pitur mātuś ca dharmataḥ || 59 ||
dṛṣṭaṃ saṅgrahaṇaṃ tajjñair nāgatāyāḥ svayaṃ gṛhe || 60 ||
svecchayopeyuṣo dārān na doṣaḥ sāhaso bhavet || 61 ||
nadīnāṃ saṅgame tīrtheṣv ārāmeṣu vaneṣu ca |

strī pumāṃś ca sameyātāṃ grāhyaṃ saṅgrahaṇaṃ bhavet || 63
                            ||
anyair api vyabhicāraiḥ sarvaṃ saṅgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam || 64 ||
striyaṃ spṛśed adeśe yaḥ spṛṣṭo vā marśayet tathā |
bhakṣair vā yadi vā bhojyair vastrair mālyais tathaiva ca |

sampreṣyamānair gandhaiś ca sarvaṃ saṅgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam || 66
                            ||
darpād vā yadi vā mohāc chlāghayā vā svayaṃ vadet |
pāṇau yaś ca nigṛhṇīyad veṇyāṃ vastrāntare 'pi vā |

tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti vā bruyāt sarvaṃ saṅgrahaṇaṃ smṛtam || 68
                            ||
uttamāyāṃ vadhas tv eva sarvasvaharaṇaṃ tathā || 70 ||
sakāmāyāṃ tu kanyāyāṃ savarṇe nāsty atikramaḥ |
kintv alaṅkṛtya satkṛtya sa evaināṃ samudvahet || 71 ||
rājñī pravrajitā dhātrī sādhvī varṇottamā ca yā || 73 ||
paśuyonyām atikrāman vineyaḥ sa damaṃ śatam |
svairiṇy abrāhmaṇī veśyā dāsī niṣkāsinī ca yā |
gamyāḥ syur ānulomyena striyo na pratilomataḥ || 77 ||
āsv eva tu bhujiṣyāsu doṣaḥ syāt paradāravat |
gamyā api hi nopeyās tāś ced anyaparigrahāḥ || 78 ||
anutpannaprajāyās tu patiḥ preyād yadi striyāḥ |
sa ca tāṃ pratipadyeta tathaivā putrajanmataḥ |
putre jāte nivarteta viplavaḥ syād ato 'nyathā || 80 ||
mukhān mukhaṃ pariharan gātrair gātrāṇy asaṃspṛśan || 81 ||

na gacched garbhiṇīṃ nindyām aniyuktāṃ ca bandhubhiḥ || 82
                            ||
aniyuktā tu yā nārī devarāj janayet sutam |
yavīyaso vā yo jyāyān ubhau tau gurutalpagau || 84 ||
kule tadavaśeṣe tu santānārthaṃ na kāmataḥ |
avidyamāne tu gurau rājño vācyaḥ kulakṣayaḥ |
tatas tadvacanād gacched anuśiṣya striyā saha || 86 ||
sakṛd ā garbhādhānād vā kṛte garbhe snuṣaiva sā || 87 ||
ato 'nyathā vartamānaḥ pumān strī vāpi kāmataḥ |
vineyau subhṛśaṃ rājñā kilbiṣī syād anigrahāt || 88 ||
dampatī vivadeyātāṃ na jñātiṣu na rājani || 89 ||
vyabhicāre striyā mauṇḍyam adhaḥśayanam eva ca |
kadannaṃ vā kuvāsaś ca karma cāvaskaroñjhanam || 91 ||

bhartuś ca vadham icchantīṃ striyaṃ nirvāsayed gṛhāt || 92
                            ||
pūrvāśinīṃ ca yā bhartuḥ striyaṃ nirvāsayed budhaḥ || 93 ||
vandhyāṃ strījananīṃ nindyāṃ pratikulāṃ ca sarvadā |
kāmato nābhinandeta kurvann evaṃ sa doṣabhāk || 94 ||
tyajan bhāryām avasthāpyo rājñā daṇḍena bhūyasā || 95 ||
bandhubhiḥ sā niyoktavyā nirbandhuḥ svayam āśrayet || 96 ||
naṣṭe mṛte pravrajite klībe ca patite patau |
pañcasv āpatsu nārīṇāṃ patir anyo vidhīyate || 97 ||
aṣṭau varṣāṇy udīkṣeta brāhmaṇī proṣitaṃ patim |
kṣatriyā ṣaṭ samās tiṣṭhed aprasūtā samātrayam |
vaiśyā prasūtā catvāri dve same tv itarā vaset || 99 ||
na śūdrāyāḥ smṛtaḥ kālo na ca dharmavyatikramaḥ |
jīvati śrūyamāṇe tu syād eṣa dviguṇo vidhiḥ || 101 ||
ato 'nyagamane strīṇām evaṃ doṣo na vidyate || 102 ||
ānulomyena varṇānāṃ yaj janma sa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ |
prātilomyena yaj janma sa jñeyo varṇasaṅkaraḥ || 103 ||
anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ putraḥ putra ekāntaras tathā |
ambaṣṭho māgadhaś caiva kṣattā ca kṣatriyāsutāḥ |
te saṅkarāḥ śvapākādyās teṣāṃ triḥ saptako gaṇaḥ || 109 ||
ekāntaras tu dauṣṣanto vaiśyāyāṃ brāhmaṇāt sutaḥ |
śūdrāyāṃ kṣatriyāt tadvan niṣādo nāma jāyate || 111 ||
śūdrā pāraśavaṃ sūte brāhmaṇād uttaraṃ sutam |
ānulomyena varṇānāṃ putrā hy ete prakīrtitāḥ || 112 ||
sūtaś ca māgadhaś caiva putrāv āyogavas tathā |
anantaraḥ smṛtaḥ sūto brāhmaṇyāṃ kṣatriyāt sutaḥ |
brāhmaṇy ekāntaraṃ vaiśyāt sūte vaidehakaṃ sutam |
kṣattāraṃ kṣatriyā śūdrāt putram ekāntaraṃ tathā || 115 ||
cāṇḍālo jāyate śūdrād brāhmaṇī yatra muhyati || 116 ||
rājñā parīkṣyaṃ na yathā jāyate varṇasaṅkaraḥ |
tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa trayī rakṣyā tu saṅkarāt || 117 ||
dāyabhāga iti proktaṃ tad vivādapadaṃ budhaiḥ || 1 ||
pitary ūrdhvaṃ mṛte putrā vibhajeyur dhanaṃ pituḥ |
mātur nivṛtte rajasi prattāsu bhaginīṣu ca |
pitaiva vā svayaṃ putrān vibhajed vayasi sthitaḥ |
jyeṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭhavibhāgena yathā vāsya matir bhavet || 4 ||
bibhṛyād vecchataḥ sarvāñ jyeṣṭho bhrātā yathā pitā |
bhrātā śaktaḥ kaniṣṭho vā śaktyapekṣaḥ kule kriyā || 5 ||
śauryabhāryādhane hitvā yac ca vidyādhanaṃ bhavet |
trīṇy etāny avibhājyāni prasādo yaś ca paitṛkaḥ || 6 ||
mātrā ca svadhanaṃ dattaṃ yasmai syāt prītipūrvakam |
tasyāpy eṣa vidhir dṛṣṭo mātāpīṣṭe yathā pitā || 7 ||
kuṭumbaṃ bibhṛyād bhrātur yo vidyām adhigacchataḥ |
bhāgaṃ vidyādhanāt tasmāt sa labhetāśruto 'pi san || 10 ||
vaidyo 'vaidyāya nākāmo dadyād aṃśaṃ svato dhanāt |
pitṛdravyaṃ tad āśritya na cet tena tad āhṛtam || 11 ||
dvāv āṃśau pratipadyeta vibhajann ātmanaḥ pitā |
samāṃśabhāginī mātā putrāṇāṃ syān mṛte patau || 12 ||
jyeṣṭhāyāṃśo 'dhiko deyaḥ jyeṣṭhāya tu varaḥ smṛtaḥ |
samāṃśabhājaḥ śeṣāḥ syur aprattā bhaginī tathā || 13 ||
kṣetrajeṣv api putreṣu tadvaj jāteṣu dharmataḥ |
pitraiva tu vibhaktā ye hīnādhikasamair dhanaiḥ |
teṣāṃ sa eva dharmaḥ syāt sarvasya hi pitā prabhuḥ || 15 ||
kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhāyāṃ yaś ca jāyate |
teṣāṃ voḍhāpitā jñeyas te ca bhāgaharāḥ smṛtāḥ || 16 ||
mātāmahāya dadyāt sa piṇḍaṃ rikthaṃ hareta ca || 17 ||
jātā ye tv aniyuktāyām ekena bahubhis tathā |
arikthabhājas te sarve bījinām eva te sutāḥ || 18 ||
dadyus te bījine piṇḍaṃ mātā cec chulkato hṛtā |
aśulkopagatāyāṃ tu piṇḍadā voḍhur eva te || 19 ||
pitṛdviṭ patitaḥ paṇḍo yaś ca syād aupapātikaḥ |
aurasā api naite 'ṃśaṃ labheran kṣetrajāḥ kutaḥ || 20 ||

bhartavyāḥ syuḥ kule caite tatputrās tv aṃśabhāginaḥ || 21
                            ||
saṃsṛṣṭināṃ tu yo bhāgas teṣām eva sa iṣyate |
bhrātÏṛṇām aprajaḥ preyāt kaścic cet pravrajet tu vā |
vibhajeyur dhanaṃ tasya śeṣās tu strīdhanaṃ vinā || 24 ||
bharaṇam cāsya kurvīran strīṇām ā jīvitakṣayāt |
rakṣanti śayyāṃ bhartuś ced ācchindyur itarāsu tu || 25 ||
syād yasya duhitā tasyāḥ pitraṃśo bharaṇe mataḥ |
ā saṃskārād bhajed enāṃ parato bibhṛyāt patiḥ || 26 ||
mṛte bhartary aputrāyāḥ patipakṣaḥ prabhuḥ striyāḥ |
pakṣadvayāvasāne tu rājā bhartā smṛtaḥ striyāḥ |
sa tasyā bharaṇaṃ kuryān nigṛhṇīyāt pathaś cyutām || 29 ||
svātantryād vipraṇaśyanti kule jātā api striyaḥ |
pitā rakṣati kaumāre bhartā rakṣati yauvane |

putrā rakṣanti vaidhavye na strī svātantryam arhati || 31
                            ||
yac chiṣṭaṃ pitṛdāyebhyo dattva rṇaṃ paitṛkaṃ ca yat |
bhrātṛbhis tad vibhaktavyam ṛṇī na syād yathā pitā || 32 ||
yeṣāṃ ca na kṛtāḥ pitrā saṃskāravidhayaḥ kramāt |
kartavyā bhrātṛbhis teṣāṃ paitṛkād eva te dhanāt || 33 ||
avidyamāne pitrye 'rthe svāṃśād uddhṛtya vā punaḥ |
kuṭumbārtheṣu codyuktas tatkāryaṃ kurute ca yaḥ |
vibhāge sati dharmo 'pi bhaved eṣāṃ pṛthak pṛthak || 37 ||
sākṣitvaṃ prātibhāvyaṃ ca dānaṃ grahaṇam eva ca |
yeṣām etāḥ kriyā loke pravartante svarikthinām |
vibhaktān avagaccheyur lekhyam apy antareṇa tān || 40 ||
svān bhāgān yadi dadyus te vikrīṇīrann athāpi vā |
kuryur yatheṣṭaṃ tat sarvam īśante svadhanasya te || 42 ||
aurasaḥ kṣetrajaś caiva putrikāputra eva ca |
kānīnaś ca sahoḍhaś ca gūḍhotpannas tathaiva ca || 43 ||
paunarbhavo 'paviddhaś ca labdhaḥ krītaḥ kṛtas tathā |
pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ smṛtaḥ śreyāj jaghanyo yo ya uttaraḥ || 45 ||
kramād dhy ete prapadyeran mṛte pitari taddhanam |
putraś ca duhitā coktau pituḥ santānakārakau || 47 ||
abhāve tu duhitṝṇāṃ sakulyā bāndhavās tataḥ |
tataḥ sajātyāḥ sarveṣām abhāve rājagāmi tat || 48 ||
sa strīṇāṃ jīvanaṃ dadyād eṣa dāyavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ || 49 ||
tat sāhasam iti proktaṃ saho balam ihocyate || 1 ||
tat punas trividhaṃ jñeyaṃ prathamaṃ madhyamaṃ tathā |
uttamaṃ ceti śāstreṣu tasyoktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthak || 2 ||
vadhād ṛte brāhmaṇasya na vadhaṃ brāhmaṇo 'rhati || 8 ||
śiraso muṇḍanaṃ daṇḍas tasya nirvāsanaṃ purāt |
syātāṃ saṃvyavahāryau tau dhṛtadaṇḍau tu pūrvayoḥ |
tasyaiva bhedaḥ steyaṃ syād viśeṣas tatra cocyate |
atisāhasam ākramya steyam āhuś chalena tu || 11 ||
tad api trividhaṃ proktaṃ dravyāpekṣaṃ manīṣibhiḥ |
vāsaḥ kauśeyavarjaṃ ca govarjaṃ paśavas tathā |
hiraṇyavarjaṃ lohaṃ ca madhyaṃ vrīhiyavā api || 14 ||
śaktāś ca ya upekṣante te 'pi taddoṣabhāginaḥ || 18 ||
utkrośatāṃ janānāṃ ca hriyamāṇe dhane 'pi ca |
sāhaseṣu ya evoktas triṣu daṇḍo manīṣibhiḥ |
sa eva daṇḍaḥ steye 'pi dravyeṣu triṣv anukramāt || 20 ||
padenānveṣaṇaṃ kuryur ā mūlāt tadvido janāḥ || 21 ||
grāme vraje vivīte vā yatra sannipatet padam |

voḍhavyaṃ tad bhavet tena na cet so 'nyatra tan nayet || 22
                            ||
pade pramūḍhe bhagne vā viṣamatvāj janāntike |
yas tv āsannataro grāmo vrajo vā tatra pātayet || 23 ||
same 'dhvani dvayor yatra tena prāyo 'śucir janaḥ |
pūrvāpadānair dṛṣṭo vā saṃsṛṣṭo vā durātmabhiḥ || 24 ||
rātrisañcāriṇo ye ca bahiḥ kuryur bahiścarāḥ || 25 ||
steneṣv alabhyamāneṣu rājā dadyāt svakād dhanāt |
upekṣamāṇo hy enasvī dharmād arthāc ca hīyate || 26 ||
yad vacaḥ pratikūlārthaṃ vākpāruṣyaṃ tad ucyate || 1 ||
gauravānukramād asya daṇḍo 'py atra kramād guruḥ || 2 ||
trīṇy eva sāhasāny āhus tatra kaṇṭakaśodhanam || 6 ||
vidhiḥ pañcavidhas tūkta etayor ubhayor api |

viśuddhir daṇḍabhāktvaṃ ca tatra sambadhyate yathā || 7
                            ||
pāruṣye sati saṃrambhād utpanne kṣubdhayor dvayoḥ |
sa manyate yaḥ kṣamate daṇḍabhāg yo 'tivartate || 8 ||
viśeṣaś cen na dṛśyeta vinayaḥ syāt samas tayoḥ || 9 ||
pūrvam ākṣārayed yas tu niyataṃ syāt sa doṣabhāk |

paścād yaḥ so 'py asatkārī pūrve tu vinayo guruḥ || 10
                            ||
dvayor āpannayos tulyam anubadhnāti yaḥ punaḥ |
sa tayor daṇḍam āpnoti pūrvo vā yadi vetaraḥ || 11 ||
na ca taddaṇḍapāruṣye doṣam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ || 13 ||
yam eva hy ativarterann ete santaṃ janaṃ nṛṣu |
sa eva vinayaṃ kuryān na tadvinayabhāṅ nṛpaḥ || 14 ||
malā hy ete manuṣyeṣu dhanam eṣāṃ malātmakam |
api tān ghātayed rājā nārthadaṇḍena daṇḍayet || 15 ||
śataṃ brāhmaṇam ākruśya kṣatriyo daṇḍam arhati |

vaiśyo 'dhyardhaṃ śataṃ dve vā śūdras tu vadham arhati || 16
                            ||

vaiśye syād ardhapañcāśac chūdre dvādaśako damaḥ || 17
                            ||
vādeṣv avacanīyeṣu tad eva dviguṇaṃ bhavet || 18 ||
kāṇam apy athavā khañjam anyaṃ vāpi tathāvidham |

na rājñā dhṛtadaṇḍaṃ ca daṇḍabhāk tadvyatikramāt || 20
                            ||
loke 'smin dvāv avaktavyāv adaṇḍyau ca prakīrtitau |
brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca tau hīdaṃ bibhṛto jagat || 21 ||
patitaṃ patitety uktvā cauraṃ caureti vā punaḥ |

vacanāt tulyadoṣaḥ syān mithyā dvir doṣatāṃ vrajet || 22
                            ||

taptam āsecayet tailaṃ vaktre śrotre ca pārthivaḥ || 24
                            ||

tad aṅgaṃ tasya chettavyam evaṃ śuddhim avāpnuyāt || 25
                            ||

kaṭyāṃ kṛṭāṅko nirvāsyaḥ sphigdeśaṃ vāsya kartayet || 26
                            ||
avaniṣṭhīvato darpād dvāv oṣṭhau chedayen nṛpaḥ |
pādayor nāsikāyāṃ ca grīvāyāṃ vṛṣaṇeṣu ca || 28 ||
upakruśya tu rājānaṃ vartmani sve vyavasthitam |
rājani prahared yas tu kṛtāgasy api durmatiḥ |
putrāparādhe na pitā na śvavāñ śuni daṇḍabhāk |
na markaṭe ca tatsvāmī tair eva prahito na cet || 31 ||
sabhikaḥ kārayed dyūtaṃ deyaṃ dadyāc ca tatkṛtam |
daśakaṃ tu śataṃ vṛddhis tasya syād dyūtakāritā || 2 ||
kitaveṣv eva tiṣṭheyuḥ kitavāḥ saṃśayaṃ prati |
ta eva tasya draṣṭāraḥ syus ta eva ca sākṣiṇaḥ || 4 ||
pratihanyān na sabhikaṃ dāpayet tat svam iṣṭataḥ || 5 ||
kaṇṭhe 'kṣamālām āsajya sa hy eṣāṃ vinayaḥ smṛtaḥ || 6 ||
na dṛṣṭaṃ yac ca pūrveṣu tat sarvaṃ syāt prakīrṇake || 4 ||
rājā tv avahitaḥ sarvān āśramān paripālayet |
yo yo varṇo 'vahīyeta yo vodrekam anuvrajet |

taṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā svato mārgāt pracyutaṃ sthāpayet pathi || 6
                            ||
śrutismṛtiviruddhaṃ ca janānām ahitaṃ ca yat |
na tat pravartayed rājā pravṛttaṃ ca nivartayet || 8 ||
nyāyāpetaṃ yad anyena rājñājñānakṛtaṃ ca yat |
tad apy anyāyavihitaṃ punar nyāye niveśayet || 9 ||
daṇḍyaḥ sa pāpo vadhyaś ca lopayan rājaśāsanam || 10 ||
yac ca yasyopakaraṇaṃ yena jīvanti kārukāḥ |
sarvasvaharaṇe 'py etān na rājā hartum arhati || 12 ||
anādiś cāpy anantaś ca dvipadāṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ |

dīptimatvāc chucitvāc ca yadi na syāt pathaś cyutaḥ || 13
                            ||
yadi rājā na sarveṣāṃ varṇānāṃ daṇḍadhāraṇam |
kuryāt patho vyapetānāṃ vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ || 14 ||
brāhmaṇyaṃ brāhmaṇo jahyāt kṣatriyaḥ kṣātram utsṛjet |
svakarma jahyād vaiśyas tu śūdraḥ sarvān viśeṣayet || 15 ||
satām anugraho nityam asatāṃ nigrahas tathā |
eṣa dharmaḥ smṛto rājñām arthaś cāmitrapīḍanāt || 17 ||
na lipyate yathā vahnir dahañ chaśvad imāḥ prajāḥ |
na lipyate tathā rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣu pātayan || 18 ||
ājñā tejaḥ pārthivānāṃ sā ca vāci pratiṣṭhitā |
te yad brūyur asat sad vā sa dharmo vyavahāriṇām || 19 ||
rājā nāma caraty eṣa bhūmau sākṣāt sahasradṛk |
na tasyājñām atikramya santiṣṭheran prajāḥ kvacit || 20 ||
yad eva rājā kurute tat pramāṇam iti sthitiḥ || 21 ||
nirguṇo 'pi yathā strīṇāṃ pūjya eva patiḥ sadā |
prajānāṃ viguṇo 'py evaṃ pūjya eva narādhipaḥ || 22 ||
tapaḥkrītāḥ prajā rājñā prabhur āsāṃ tato nṛpaḥ |
tatas tadvacasi stheyaṃ vārtā cāsāṃ tadāśrayā || 23 ||
agner indrasya somasya yamasya dhanadasya ca || 24 ||
kāraṇād animittaṃ vā yadā krodhavaśaṃ gataḥ |
abhiyāti parān rājā tadendraḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ || 26 ||
prajānāṃ darśanaṃ yāti soma ity ucyate tadā || 27 ||
dharmāsanagataḥ śrīmān daṇḍaṃ dhatte yadā nṛpaḥ |
samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadā vaivasvataḥ yamaḥ || 28 ||
anugṛhṇāti dānena tadā sa dhanadaḥ smṛtaḥ || 29 ||
tasmāt taṃ nāvajānīyān nākrośen na viśeṣayet |
ājñāyāṃ cāsya tiṣṭheta mṛtyuḥ syāt tadvyatikramāt || 30 ||
agraṃ navebhyaḥ sasyebhyo mārgadānaṃ ca gacchataḥ |
anākṣepaḥ parebhyaś ca sambhāṣaś ca parastriyā || 35 ||
nadīṣv avetanas tāraḥ pūrvam uttaraṇaṃ tathā |
tareṣv aśulkadānaṃ ca na ced vāṇijyam asya tat || 36 ||
brāhmaṇo nāparādhnoti dvāv ikṣū pañca mūlakān || 37 ||
nābhiśastān na patitān na dviṣo na ca nāstikāt |
na sopadhān nānimittaṃ na dātāraṃ prapīḍya ca || 38 ||
arthānāṃ bhūribhāvāc ca deyatvāc ca mahātmanām |
śreyān pratigraho rājñāṃ anyeṣāṃ brāhmaṇād ṛte || 39 ||
brāhmaṇaś caiva rājā ca dvāv apy etau dhṛtavratau |
medhyam eva dhanaṃ prāhus tīkṣṇasyāpi mahīpateḥ || 41 ||
samudre samatāṃ yāti tadvad rājño dhanāgamaḥ || 42 ||
yathā cāgnau sthitaṃ dīpte śuddhim āyāti kāñcanam |
evam evāgamā sarve śuddhim āyānti rājasu || 43 ||
ya eva kaścit svadravyaṃ brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati |
tad rājñāpy anumantavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ || 44 ||
śakyaṃ tat punar ādātuṃ yad abrāhmaṇasātkṛtam |
brāhmaṇāya tu yad dattaṃ na tasya haraṇaṃ punaḥ || 46 ||
dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñas tasya karma trilakṣaṇam |
svakarmaṇi dvijas tiṣṭhed vṛttim āhārayet kṛtām |
aśucir vacanād yasya śucir bhavati puruṣaḥ |
śuciś caivāśuciḥ sadyaḥ kathaṃ rājā na daivatam || 49 ||
vidur ya eva devatvaṃ rājño hy amitatejasaḥ |
tasya te pratigṛhṇanto na lipyante dvijātayaḥ || 50 ||
loke 'smin maṅgalāny aṣṭau brāhmaṇo gaur hutāśanaḥ |
hiraṇyaṃ sarpir āditya āpo rājā tathāṣṭamaḥ || 51 ||
etāni satataṃ paśyen namasyed arcayec ca tān |
pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvīta tathā hy āyur na hīyate || 52 ||
prakāśāś cāprakāśāś ca tān vidyād ātmavān nṛpaḥ || 1 ||
suptān pramattāṃś ca narā muṣṇanty ākramya caiva te || 4 ||
ity evamādayo jñeyā aprakāśāś ca taskarāḥ || 5 ||
carā hy utsāhayeyus tāṃs taskarān pūrvataskarāḥ || 9 ||
tathā cauryāpadeśaiś ca kuryus teṣāṃ samāgamam || 10 ||
ye tatra nopasarpanti sṛtāḥ praṇihitā api |
yāṃs tatra caurān gṛhṇīyāt tān vitāḍya viḍambya ca |
avaghuṣya ca sarvatra vadhyāś citravadhena te || 12 ||
na tv ahoḍhānvitāś caurā rājñā vadhyā hy anāgamāḥ |
teṣāṃ sarvasvam ādāya bhūyo nindāṃ prakalpayet || 14 ||
deśaṃ kālaṃ diśaṃ jātiṃ nāma vā sampratiśrayam |
kṛtyaṃ karmakarā vā syuḥ praṣṭavyās te vinigrahe || 16 ||
leśair apy avagantavyā na hoḍhenaiva kevalam || 18 ||
dasyuvṛtte yadi nare śaṅkā syāt taskare 'pi vā |
yadi spṛśyeta leśena kāryaḥ syāc chapathaḥ tataḥ || 19 ||
kretāraś caiva bhāṇḍānāṃ pratigrāhiṇa eva ca |
samadaṇḍāḥ smṛtā hy ete ye ca pracchādayanti tān || 21 ||
abhyāghāteṣu madhyasthā yathā caurās tathaiva te || 22 ||
gocare yasya muṣyeta tena caurāḥ prayatnataḥ |
mṛgyā dāpyo 'nyathā moṣaṃ padaṃ yadi na nirgatam || 23 ||
nirgate tu pade tasmin naṣṭe 'nyatra nipātite |
sāmantān mārgapālāṃś ca dikpālāṃś caiva dāpayet || 24 ||
gṛhe vai muṣite rājā cauragrāhāṃs tu dāpayet |
ārakṣakān rāṣṭrikāṃś ca yadi cauro na labhyate || 25 ||
yadi vā dāpyamānānāṃ tasmin moṣe tu saṃśayaḥ |
caure labdhe labheyus te dviguṇaṃ pratipāditāḥ || 27 ||
tadabhāve tu mūlyaṃ syād daṇḍaṃ dāpyaś ca tatsamam || 28 ||
nyūnaṃ tv ekādaśaguṇaṃ daṇḍaṃ dāpyo 'bravīn manuḥ || 33 ||
ratnānāṃ caiva mukhyānāṃ śatād abhyadhikaṃ vadhaḥ || 34 ||
sarvasvaṃ strīṃ tu harataḥ kanyāṃ tu harato vadhaḥ || 35 ||
śatāni pañca tu paro madhyamo dviśatāvaraḥ || 37 ||
trividhaḥ sāhaseṣv eva daṇḍaḥ proktaḥ svayambhuvā || 38 ||
dvitīye caiva taccheṣaṃ daṇḍaḥ pūrvaś ca sāhasaḥ || 39 ||
tat tad evāsya chettavyaṃ tan manor anuśāsanam || 41 ||
stene nipātayed daṇḍaṃ na yathā prathame tathā || 42 ||
triṣu varṇeṣu yāni syur brāhmaṇo rakṣitaḥ sadā || 43 ||
upastham udaraṃ jihvā hastau pādau ca pañcamam |
cakṣur nāsā ca karṇau ca dhanaṃ dehas tathaiva ca || 44 ||
na mitrakāraṇād rājñā vipulād vā dhanāgamāt |
yāvān avadhyasya vadhe tāvān vadhyasya mokṣaṇe |
bhavaty adharmo nṛpater dharmas tu viniyacchataḥ || 47 ||
na jātu brāhmaṇaṃ hanyāt sarvapāpeṣv api sthitam |
nirvāsaṃ kārayet kāmam iti dharmo vyavasthitaḥ || 48 ||
sarvasvaṃ vā hared rājā caturthaṃ vāvaśeṣayet |
gurutalpe bhagaḥ kāryaḥ surāpāne dhvajaḥ smṛtaḥ |
steye tu śvapadaṃ kṛtvā śikhipittena kūṭayet || 51 ||
asambhāṣyaś ca kartavyas tan manor anuśāsanam || 52 ||
ācakṣāṇena tatsteyam evaṃ kartāsmi śādhi mām || 53 ||
rājānaṃ tat spṛśed ena utsṛjantaṃ sakilbiṣam || 54 ||
rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ |
nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā || 55 ||
śāsanād vā vimokṣād vā steno mucyate kilbiṣāt |
aśāsanāt tu tad rājā stenasyāpnoti kilbiṣam || 56 ||
gurur ātmavatāṃ śāstā śāstā rājā durātmanām |
aṣṭāpādyaṃ tu śūdrasya steye bhavati kilbiṣam |

dvir aṣṭāpādyaṃ vaiśyasya dvātriṃśat kṣatriyasya tu || 58
                            ||
tatrāpi ca viśeṣeṇa vidvatsv abhyadhikaṃ bhavet || 59 ||
śārīraś cārthadaṇḍaś ca daṇḍas tu dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ |
śārīrā daśadhā proktā arthadaṇḍās tv anekadhā || 60 ||
kākaṇyādis tv arthadaṇḍaḥ sarvasvāntas tathaiva ca |
śārīras tv avarodhādir jīvitāntas tathaiva ca || 61 ||
kākaṇyādis tu yo daṇḍaḥ sa tu māṣāparaḥ smṛtaḥ |
māṣāvarādyo yaḥ proktaḥ kārṣāpaṇaparas tu saḥ || 62 ||
kārṣāpaṇādyā ye proktāḥ sarve te syuś caturguṇāḥ |
evam anye tu vijñeyāḥ prāk ca te pūrvasāhasāt || 64 ||
paṇair nibaddhaḥ pūrvasyāṃ ṣoḍaśaiva paṇāḥ sa tu || 65 ||
māṣo viṃśatibhāgas tu jñeyaḥ kārṣāpaṇasya tu |
kākaṇī tu caturbhāgo māṣasya ca paṇasya ca || 66 ||
pāñcanadyāḥ pradeśe tu sañjñā yā vyāvahārikī |
kārṣāpaṇapramāṇaṃ tu nibaddham iha vai tayā || 67 ||
kārṣāpaṇo 'ṇḍikā jñeyāś catasras tās tu dhānakaḥ |
yadā sākṣī na vidyate vivāde vadatāṃ nṛṇām |
tadā divyaiḥ parīkṣeta śapathaiś ca pṛthagvidhaiḥ || 1 ||
alpeṣu ca naraḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śapathaiḥ śāpayen naram || 3 ||
ete hi śapathāḥ proktāḥ sukarās svalpasaṃśaye |
sāhaseṣv abhiśāpe ca vidhir divyaḥ prakīrtitaḥ || 4 ||
divyaḥ pañcavidho jñeya ity āha bhagavān manuḥ || 5 ||
dhaṭo 'gnir udakaṃ caiva viṣaṃ kośaś ca pañcamaḥ |
ṣaḍḍhastaṃ tu tayor dṛṣṭaṃ pramāṇaṃ parimāṇataḥ || 8 ||
pādayor antaraṃ hastaṃ bhaved adhyardham eva ca |
tulayitvā naraṃ pūrvaṃ cihnaṃ kuryād dhaṭasya tu |
kakṣāsthānena taṃ tulyam avatārya tato dhaṭāt || 10 ||

tasminn evaṃ kṛte sā cet kakṣe sthāpya suniścalā || 11
                                ||
tulito yadi vardheta śuddhaḥ syān nātre saṃśayaḥ |
samo vā hīyamāno vā na viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 12 ||
tvaṃ vetsi sarvabhūtānāṃ pāpāni sukṛtāni ca |
tvam eva dhaṭa jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || 13 ||
tad eva saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi || 14 ||
ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi lohasya vidhim uttamam |
kalpitair maṇḍalair evam uṣitasya śucer api |

hastābhyāṃ piṇḍam ādāya śanaiḥ saptapadaṃ vrajet || 18
                                ||
na maṇḍalam atikrāmen nāpy arvāk pādayet padam |

adagdhaḥ sarvato yas tu sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 20
                                ||
bhayād vā pātayate yas tv adagdho yo vibhāvyate |
punas taṃ hārayel lohaṃ sthitir eṣā purātanī |
yathāvad eva jānīṣe na vidur yāni mānuṣāḥ || 23 ||
tad enaṃ saṃśayāpannaṃ dharmatas trātum arhasi || 24 ||
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi toyasya vidhim uttamam |
madhyamas tu śaro grāhyaḥ puruṣeṇa yavīyasā |

pratyānītasya tasyātha sa viśuddho bhaven naraḥ || 26
                                ||
anyathā na viśuddhaḥ syād ekāṅgam api darśayet |

sthānād anyatra vā gacched yasmin pūrvaṃ niveṣitaḥ || 27
                                ||
striyas tu na balāt kāryā na pumān api durbalaḥ |
bhīrutvād yoṣito mṛtyuḥ kṛśasyāpi balāt kuryāt |

sahasā prāpnuyāt sarvāṃs tasmād etān na majjayet || 28
                                ||
yataś cāgnir abhūd asmāt tatas toyaṃ viśiṣyate || 30 ||
tasmāt satyena bhagavañ jaleśa trātum arhasi || 31 ||
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi viṣasya vidhim uttamam |
tulayitvā viṣaṃ pūrvaṃ deyam etad dhimāgame || 32 ||
na pūrvāhṇe na madhyāhne na sandhyāyāṃ tu dharmavit |
bhagnaṃ ca dāritaṃ caiva dhūpitaṃ miśritaṃ tathā |
kālakūṭam alambuṃ ca viṣaṃ yatnena varjayet || 34 ||

viṣasya tu yavān sapta dadyāc chodye ghṛtaplutān || 36
                                ||
viṣasya palaṣaḍbhāgād bhāgo viṃśatimas tu yaḥ |

tam aṣṭabhāgahīnaṃ tu śodhye dadyād ghṛtaplutam || 37
                                ||

viśuddham iti taṃ jñātvā rājā satkṛtya mokṣayet || 39
                                ||
tvaṃ viṣa brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ satyadharmaratau sthitaḥ |
ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi kośasya vidhim uttamam || 41 ||
yadbhaktaḥ so 'bhiyuktaḥ syāt taddaivatyaṃ tu pāyayet |
saptāhād yasya dṛśyate dvisaptāhena vā punaḥ |

pratyātmikaṃ tu yatkiñcit saiva tasya vibhāvanā || 43
                                ||
dvisaptāhāt paraṃ yasya mahad vā vaikṛtaṃ bhavet |
dadyād rājābhiyuktānāṃ pretya ceha ca nandati || 46 ||
na viṣaṃ brāhmaṇe dadyān na lohaṃ kṣatriyo haret |

na nimajjyāpsu vaiśyaś ca śūdraḥ kośaṃ na pāyayet || 47
                                ||
varṣāsu na viṣaṃ dadyāt hemante nāpsu majjayet |
na lohaṃ hārayed grīṣme na kośaṃ pāyayen niśi || 48 ||
